t: Peavey Electronics - Wikipedia
s: January 12, 2025 - Peavey Electronics owns eight brands: MediaMatrix, Architectural Acoustics, PVDJ, Crest Audio, Composite Acoustic, Sanctuary Series, Budda Amplification, and Trace Elliot. The company still holds 180 patents, and at one time its product range boasted more than 2000 designs.
